text:
In our production environment we have the latest Mod-Jk release running on Apache2.2 which is not releasing connecting to its JBoss application server fast enough. It seems that all http requests to AJP port 8009 remain in TIME_WAIT for a long time. Although the connecting do get cleaned up as specified in the mod-jk (workers.props) its still very concerning that this is happening.

I was able to get around the issue of Jboss not releasing its socket connection by upgrading to Jboss 4.2.CP02 and the application server is managing these connections w/o any problems.
